title: Wald of Sun
shortDescription: Mystical embroidery featuring a radiant sun figure surrounded by ornate golden patterns.
fullDescription: This intricate embroidery depicts a mystical sun deity with flowing hair and ornate decorative elements. Created using needle felting and wet felting techniques, the piece combines warm golden tones with delicate facial features and symbolic patterns.
story: Inspired by ancient sun worship and forest spirits, this embroidered piece represents the life-giving energy of the sun filtering through woodland canopies.

title: Dragonfly in Summer
shortDescription: Vibrant embroidery of a detailed dragonfly with intricate wing patterns in blue and green tones
fullDescription: This stunning embroidered piece captures the delicate beauty of a dragonfly with meticulously crafted wing details. The mosaic-like background creates depth while the dragonfly appears to hover over a summer garden scene.
story: Created during summer evenings when dragonflies dance over garden ponds, this embroidered piece celebrates the ephemeral beauty of these magical creatures.

title: Dancing Girl
shortDescription: Dynamic embroidery depicting a graceful dancer with flowing golden hair and ornate costume
fullDescription: This expressive embroidered piece captures the energy and movement of dance through wool fibers. The flowing hair and decorative costume elements create a sense of motion and celebration.
story: Inspired by folk dances and the joy of movement, this embroidered piece embodies the freedom and expression found in traditional dance forms.

title: Rose on Grey
shortDescription: Elegant minimalist embroidery of a white rose with checkered ribbon on grey background
fullDescription: This sophisticated embroidered piece features a delicate white rose with a distinctive checkered ribbon stem against a textured grey background. The contrast creates a striking and elegant composition.
story: Inspired by the beauty of simplicity, this embroidered rose represents hope and purity emerging from neutral surroundings.

title: Rose on Burgundy
shortDescription: Romantic embroidery of a pink rose with flowing ribbon on rich burgundy background
fullDescription: This romantic embroidered piece showcases a soft pink rose with flowing green ribbon against a luxurious burgundy backdrop. The warm color palette creates an intimate and sophisticated atmosphere.
story: Created as a symbol of enduring love and passion, the embroidered rose against burgundy represents deep emotions and lasting beauty.

title: Abstract
shortDescription: Abstract embroidery with swirling patterns in earth tones representing abundance and harvest
fullDescription: This abstract embroidered composition features flowing, organic patterns in warm earth tones. The swirling forms suggest abundance, growth, and the cyclical nature of harvest seasons.
story: Inspired by autumn harvests and the abundance of nature, this embroidered piece celebrates the fruits of patience and care.

title: Navy V-Neck Wool Vest
shortDescription: Elegant navy blue wool vest with deep V-neck design and short sleeves, handmade in L size
fullDescription: This sophisticated navy blue wool vest features a classic V-neck design with short sleeves and a tailored fit. The rich navy color and high-quality wool construction make it a versatile piece for layering or wearing on its own. Handcrafted with attention to detail and finished to a professional standard.
story: Inspired by timeless elegance and modern versatility, this navy wool vest embodies the perfect balance between classic tailoring and contemporary style. Each piece is handmade with care, ensuring unique character and lasting quality.

title: Pearl Stripe Top
shortDescription: Elegant striped top in pearl and grey tones with scoop neckline, crafted from wool, silk, and cotton blend
fullDescription: This sophisticated striped top features beautiful pearl and grey horizontal stripes with a flattering scoop neckline and comfortable short sleeves. Made from a luxurious blend of wool, silk, and cotton, it offers both comfort and elegance. The relaxed fit makes it perfect for layering or wearing on its own.
story: Inspired by the timeless appeal of nautical stripes with a modern twist, this top combines the warmth of wool, the luxury of silk, and the comfort of cotton to create a versatile piece that transitions beautifully from casual to sophisticated settings.

title: Stylish Cotton Quilted Vest
shortDescription: Artistic quilted vest with open front design featuring unique patchwork patterns and zipper closure
fullDescription: This striking sleeveless vest showcases an innovative quilted design with artistic patchwork panels in various textures and patterns. The open front style with zipper closure creates a modern, edgy look. Each panel tells its own story through different fabric treatments and artistic elements, making this a truly unique statement piece.
story: Born from the fusion of traditional quilting techniques and contemporary street style, this vest represents the art of upcycling and creative expression. Each patchwork element has been carefully selected and arranged to create a wearable piece of art that celebrates individuality and craftsmanship.

title: Tan Wool Lightweight Top
shortDescription: Lightweight tan wool top with decorative lizard embroidery and blanket stitch edging in M-L size
fullDescription: This charming lightweight wool top in warm tan color features an intricate embroidered lizard design surrounded by decorative elements. The piece is finished with beautiful blanket stitch edging around the neckline, sleeves, and hem, adding artisanal detail to this comfortable and unique garment.
story: Inspired by the natural world and traditional embroidery techniques, this top celebrates the beauty of wildlife through textile art. The lizard motif represents adaptability and renewal, while the hand-finished edges showcase the maker's attention to craftsmanship and detail.

title: Purple Felted Wool Vest with Floral Embroidery
shortDescription: Elegant purple felted wool sleeveless vest with intricate embroidered floral patterns on front and back
fullDescription: This beautiful sleeveless vest is crafted from soft purple felted wool and features stunning embroidered designs. The front showcases textural patterns at the hem, while the back displays a large decorative floral motif. The felted wool provides warmth and comfort while the embroidered details add artistic sophistication.
story: Inspired by nature's beauty and traditional textile arts, this vest combines the warmth of felted wool with the elegance of embroidered florals. Each stitch tells a story of craftsmanship and attention to detail, making this piece a wearable work of art.

title: Teal Ocean Dreams Felted Dress
shortDescription: Enchanting teal felted sleeveless dress with underwater-themed embroidery featuring sea creatures and flowing elements
fullDescription: This captivating sleeveless dress in rich teal color showcases the beauty of underwater life through intricate felted embroidery. The piece features delicate sea creatures, flowing aquatic plants, and organic patterns that create a dreamy ocean scene. The scalloped hem adds movement and fluidity, while the felted wool construction provides comfort and warmth.
story: Inspired by the mysterious depths of the ocean and its enchanting inhabitants, this dress captures the serene beauty of underwater gardens. Each embroidered element tells a story of marine life, from graceful fish to flowing seaweed, creating a wearable piece of oceanic art that connects the wearer to the natural world.

title: Mint Paisley Felted Top with Purple Trim
shortDescription: Elegant mint green felted sleeveless top featuring intricate paisley patterns and lavender purple trim details
fullDescription: This sophisticated sleeveless top combines soft mint green felted wool with beautiful paisley patterns and elegant purple trim. The asymmetrical paisley design creates visual interest while the contrasting purple edging around the neckline and hem adds a refined finishing touch. The relaxed fit and quality felted construction make it both comfortable and stylish.
story: Inspired by traditional paisley motifs and the harmony of complementary colors, this top represents the timeless elegance of textile patterns. The mint and purple color combination creates a fresh, contemporary look while honoring classic design traditions.

title: Gray Garden Bloom Embroidered Top
shortDescription: Charming gray short-sleeve top featuring a vibrant embroidered flower garden with purple, white, and yellow blooms
fullDescription: This delightful short-sleeve top in soft gray showcases a stunning embroidered flower garden across the front. The intricate needlework features clusters of purple, white, and yellow flowers nestled among rich green foliage, creating a three-dimensional garden scene. The comfortable fit and quality construction make this piece perfect for everyday wear with an artistic touch.
story: Inspired by English cottage gardens in full bloom, this top captures the joy and abundance of a spring flower garden. Each embroidered bloom represents the beauty of nature and the meditative art of needlework, bringing wearable garden magic to everyday life.

title: Lavender Leaf Pattern Sheer Top
shortDescription: Elegant lavender short-sleeve top with layered leaf pattern design and sheer overlay details
fullDescription: This sophisticated short-sleeve top features beautiful lavender and purple tones with an intricate layered leaf pattern throughout. The semi-sheer overlay creates depth and visual interest while the coordinating trim around the neckline and sleeves adds a polished finish. The flowing silhouette and artistic leaf motifs make this piece both comfortable and elegantly unique.
story: Inspired by autumn leaves and the play of light through forest canopies, this top captures the ethereal beauty of nature in textile form. The layered design represents the complexity and depth found in natural patterns, creating a wearable piece of art.

title: Beige Cherry Blossom Top with Green Trim
shortDescription: Lovely beige short-sleeve top featuring delicate cherry blossom branch patterns with vibrant green trim details
fullDescription: This charming short-sleeve top combines a soft beige base with beautiful cherry blossom branch patterns throughout. The design features delicate white and pink blossoms on graceful brown branches with fresh green leaves. The vibrant green trim around the neckline and sleeve cuffs provides a perfect contrast and adds a fresh, spring-like touch to this feminine and romantic piece.
story: Inspired by the fleeting beauty of cherry blossom season, this top captures the essence of spring renewal and natural elegance. The botanical pattern represents growth, beauty, and the cyclical nature of seasons, while the green trim symbolizes new life and fresh beginnings.

title: Gray Cable Knit Sleeveless Vest
shortDescription: Elegant gray sleeveless vest featuring intricate cable knit patterns and textural knitting details
fullDescription: This beautifully crafted sleeveless vest showcases sophisticated cable knit patterns throughout the front panels. The rich gray color and intricate knitting techniques create stunning textural details that catch the light beautifully. The V-neckline and relaxed fit make it perfect for layering or wearing as a statement piece.
story: Inspired by traditional Aran knitting techniques and the timeless appeal of cable patterns, this vest represents the artistry of hand knitting. Each cable twist and textural element tells a story of patience, skill, and the enduring beauty of crafted textiles.

title: Red Wool Viscose Handbag
shortDescription: Red wool viscose handmade handbag decorated with colored red shade flowers
fullDescription: This beautiful handmade handbag is crafted from red wool viscose and decorated with elegant red shade flowers. The bag has inside pocket and snap closure for practical daily use.
story: Inspired by blooming red flowers in summer gardens, this handbag brings natural beauty and craftsmanship together in perfect harmony.

title: White Wool Viscose Felted Purse
shortDescription: White wool viscose handmade felted purse decorated with flowers
fullDescription: This handcrafted felted purse is made from white wool viscose and beautifully decorated with flowers. It has inside pocket and snap closure for secure storage.
story: Like fresh morning blossoms on white canvas, this purse represents purity and the delicate art of felting.

title: Grey Wool Viscose Hand Felted Purse
shortDescription: Grey wool viscose hand felted purse decorated with multicolored yarn
fullDescription: This unique hand felted purse features grey wool viscose decorated with vibrant multicolored yarn details. It has inside pocket and snap closure for functionality.
story: Celebrating the joy of color and texture, this purse represents the artist's love for combining different materials in harmony.

title: Creamy Wool Viscose Hand Felted Purse
shortDescription: Creamy color wool viscose hand felted purse with flower-like picture front
fullDescription: This elegant hand felted purse in creamy color features a beautiful flower-like picture on the front. It has outside and inside pockets plus snap closure for maximum functionality.
story: Like a painted portrait of nature, this purse captures the essence of floral beauty in felted wool artistry.

title: Beginning of fall
shortDescription: This shawl is a handmade one.
fullDescription: Austrelian merino wool silk and viscose fiber have been put on the thinnest silk the way to create the complicated ornament of green, brown and orange -autumn beginning colors.
story: The creation story of this work will be added later.
